abilities.name: Evasion.
abilities.description: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

abilities.name: Stunning Strike
abilities.description: When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

abilities.name: Unarmored Defense.
abilities.description: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

abilities.name: Unarmored Movement.
abilities.description: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).
